participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Outgoing, creative, and nurturing. Enjoys connecting with others through music and nature.
participant_1.background: I like playing music and being outside, even when it's not the best weather. I speak fluent French. I fell and sprained my ankle while hiking last year. I volunteer in my son's boy scout troop. I am almost finished with my degree.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous. Loves engaging with pop culture and exploring new interests.
participant_2.background: I'm tall, even for my family, and I love going to Comic Con. I'm a vegan. I play the guitar. I drive a black car. I was born 20 years ago.

content.text: I'm good! Just got back from Comic Con.
It was great! I got to meet a lot of cool people and see some amazing cosplay.
That sounds fun. I've always wanted to go to Comic Con.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will one day. What else do you like to do?
I like to play guitar, I'm vegan, and I love going on hikes.
Oh cool! I like to play music too. I'm also a vegan.
That's awesome! I'm always looking for new vegan friends to hang out with.
Me too! I'm almost finished with my degree in music performance.
Oh, that's awesome! What instrument do you play?
I play the guitar and the drums.
That's cool! I play the guitar too.
Oh, that's awesome! We should jam sometime.
